message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10500. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a decent profit.
I'm starting to think that we're getting a bit far apart, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. I really need to stay within my budget.
